segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned it off yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to get hurt if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so distracted that she doesn’t even see what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic, but the garden outside looks so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a disaster unfold in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR
